name: Debian SSH
short_description: Debian Linux container with OpenSSH server — connect via SSH as root using a configurable password.
description: Debian Linux container with OpenSSH server — connect via SSH as root using a configurable password. Debian SSH is a self-hosted application focused on tools, utility, password-manager, security. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Debian SSH on your home server to debian linux container with openssh server — connect via ssh as root using a configurable password without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Debian SSH to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
